alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Gulf, Bay, western Calhoun, southeastern Walton and southern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 256 PM EDT/156 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking cluster of strong thunderstorms over Springfield, or near Callaway, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, Moose Pond, Abe Springs, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach and Overstreet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; South Walton; Washington
